changelog.title: Homework
changelog.txt: - "⛏⛏⛏How long can this go on?⛏⛏⛏" they said

- Added Guns & Gears - Added fluff to Bestiary creatures - Added auto-tagging of specific variants in items - Fixed BUG-46, 48, 49, 51, 52, 54, 55, 56, 66, 67, 75, and 76 - (Brew) Fixed a bug causing homebrew items not generating variant items correctly - Typos/tags

changelog.title: Discovery
changelog.txt: - Added CI/CD - Added content from: - All of the Age of Ashes adventure path - All of the Extinction Curse adventure path - All of the Agents of Edgewatch adventure path - All of the Abomination Vaults adventure path - All of the Fists of the Ruby Phoenix adventure path - Strength of Thousands #1: Kindled Magic - Strength of Thousands #2: Spoken on the Song Wind - Fixed BUG-58, 59, and 60 - Typos/tags)
- Added a sitemap

- Fixed Archetypes page feat list going out of bounds - Changed Images button to being a dropdown - Improved Sidebars - Added Lost Omens: Ancestry Guide Errata - Fixed BUG-62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 82, and 83 - Added Halcyon Spells filter - Added Battle Form Filter to Deities page - Fixed Archetype hover pop-ups having wrong padding - Added feats SEO pages - Added automatic releases on GitHub - Added Optional Features - Typos/tags

- Fixed Runebuilder buttons not rendering (sometimes)
- Added MAP

- Typos/tags

- Fixed BUG-70, 71 and 72
- Typos/tags

- Fixed a bug causing the Archetypes page not loading

changelog.title: Human After All
changelog.txt:
- Added Organizations page
- Added Open-Search
- Added Privacy Policy
- Fixed multiple CSS issues
- Revamped Spells page to account for a different way spellcasting works from 5e
- Fixed Prerequisites not showing on Optional Features page
- Added domain/mystery tags to spells
- Changed <kbd>frequency</kbd> to new format similar to <kbd>activity</kbd>
- Added CTRL + click to deselect subclasses 
- Added Patreon Button
- Added Companion Abilities
- Removed Spell Lists from spell statblocks
- Fixed duplicate tables in the Omnisearch
- Fixed flatDC scaling while they should not
- (Brew) Added CTRL + click to copy `@filter` tag to "Copy link to filters" button 
- Typos/tags

- Remove unsupported on iOS regex that was breaking the site on those devices
- Fixed Ability Rendering
- Fixed Item Variant Rendering
- Fixed Creature Scaling on GM Screen and Hover Windows
- Typos/tags

changelog.title: Random Access Memories
changelog.txt: - Started Changelogs! - Removed nonsensical heightened data - Improved Initiative Tracker conditions menu - Added Combo Weapons from Guns & Gears - Converted all baseitems into new data structure - Changed the default Calendar in GM Screen to the Golarion calendar - Added full-page "pf2-sidebar" styles and "entries" entry - Added FEAT-96 and 102 - Fixed archetype extra feats not being filtered correctly - Fixed the patreon banner loading half of Patreon with it - Fixed BUG-86 and 87 - Added gtags analytics - Added Lost Omens: World Guide book text - Updated the navbar - Added a script to replace statblock references upon deployment - Typos/tags
- Temporarily removed the cdn script until further notice

- Updated Sorcerer with new subclasses and additions to existing subclasses
- Added Sorcerer spells filter to the Spells page
- Fixed cdn script
- Expanded "paper" type
- Fixed an issue regarding item groups and adding empty <x>Data objects to items
- Removed Printer and Table View while Rune Builder is active
- Typos/tags Restored the Equipment filter to what it should be (only specific items from the CRB)
- Typos/tags Changed Heightened entries to actually be <kbd>entries</kbd> rather than <kbd>entry</kbd>
- Typos/tags Fixed all "no category found" items
- Typos/tags

changelog.title: After 3 months in development, hopefully it will be worth the wait
changelog.txt:
- Added Text Converter
- Revamped Planes & Places schema
- Upgraded Rituals Xchecks schema and added 'Must be a Creature' filter
- Revamped Deities 'avatar' schema, no longer relying on entries
- Added "L" bulk filtering to Items
- Revamped filters on Variant Rules page, now includes Rarity and approximated Category of it
- Fixed Siege Weapon rendering
- Added an <sup>[?]</sup> indicator when a filter has a tooltip
- Moved spell domains to a separate array than subclasses
- Fixed item Hands rendering
- Fixed items page text: search
- Added places page to Omnisearch
- Added subclasses to summoner
- Added 'Must be a Creature' filter to Rituals page, blacklisted by default
- Fixed single-pixel deadzone in which the mobile-only "Menu" button was hidden, which happens to exactly match the pixel width of some iPads!
- (Brew) Added "AND/OR/XOR" metadata to copied `@filter` tag parts, where appropriate
- Typos/tags
- Fixed a _copy bug

- Fixed Items page price filter and expand it
- Typos/tags

- Overhauled caching and preloading system (big to @ isaac for all of this)
    - Fixed (hopefully) caching hell/"keep CTRL+F5-ing until it works" by using a modern, robust service worker solution
    - Fixed preloaded offline data being invalidated when a new site version is released
    - Improved loading times by intelligently preloading common files/data
    - Improved loading times by checking for updates on a per-file basis, and serving a file from cache when no update is required
    - Broke down Preload Offline Data into a granular set of options, allowing faster preloads by avoiding unneeded data
    - Reworked Preload Offline Data to avoid ever having hangs due to the background process being killed off by the browser
    - Preloading offline data is now parallelized, making it significantly faster
    - Preloading may now continue in the background when navigating between pages
    - Added various notifications to better display the state of caching/preloading, including "reload to see changes" notifications
- Typos/tags Added images to missing creatures in the Bst (@ Indy Techwisp) 
- Typos/tags

- Fixed Text Converter breaking on Feats without any actions attached
- Start work on Strength of Thousands: Hurricane's Howl
- Typos/tags

- Updated the production and release scripts with the mothersite, including Docker containers
  - Hopefully fixes serviceworker on production

- Added a "Main Item" footnote to specific variants, allowing you to go back to the generic variant straight from the specific item
- Added "exists" boolean to variants, in an event where the item that you are referencing in a generic variant already exists (ex. Clothing => Explorer's Clothing)
- Merged "statblock" into "data" entries
- Typos/tags
- Re-added the script that converts former "statblock", now "data" entries to not fetch the site data and instead have all of their data included in the entry
- Fixed typo in production script
- Fixed production script

- Fixed data preparation script
- Fixed service worker script

- Fixed Ancestry Filters
- Made copying traits more bearable, as they now include spaces
- Typos/tags
- Typos/tags

- Added missing Vehicles
- Typos/tags

- Fixed adding creatures to Initiative Tracker on the GM Screen
- Typos/tags
- Added Core Rulebook 3rd printing errata - Typos/tags

- Added rarity filters to Archetypes and Classes pages
- Typos/tags

- Made the errata changes reflect the 3rd-Print CRB
- Fixed "data" tab in Companions/Familiars page
- Fixed removing elements from a list
- Typos/tags

- Made all alignment filters lengthen the names of alignments by default (N -> Neutral)
- (BUG-119) Hopefully fixed removing elements from a list properly
- (BUG-118) Fixed class page filters removing all features
- Typos/tags Tagged every dedication feat in it's archetypes feats (@ beelzebunny) 
- Typos/tags

- Fixed items page having every item be considered Melee by the filters
- Typos/tags

changelog.title: Paizo Compliancy
changelog.txt:
- Removed book data until further notice
- Fixed various CSS bugs relating to SEO pages

changelog.title: Paizo Compliancy 2.0
changelog.txt: - Added back books, now modified to account for OGL - Core Rulebook has had some of its flavor text removed - Gamemastery Guide has been almost untouched - Secrets of Magic has mainly had it's letters, research, and other on-paper entries removed - Lost Omens: World Guide has lost majority of it's book content - Added new sources - Book of the Dead - Strength of Thousands #3: Hurricane's Howl - Strength of Thousands #4: Secrets of the Temple-City - Strength of Thousands #5: Doorway to the Red Star - Strength of Thousands #6: Shadows of the Ancients - Added Creature Templates page - Simplified upcasting schema for spells - Changed Bestiary abbreviations to official versions: B1, B2, and B3 - Fixed prominent issue with adding and subtracting from lists, including the Encounter Builder (@Zobody for the latter) - Updated Archetypes page with visible rarity traits - Typos/tags

- Fixed item prices not adding up correctly
- Typos/tags

- Fixed the Companions & Familiars (& Eidolons & Beyond) page not loading
- Fixed Spell Component filters not working in the Spells page
- Turned some information on the ancestries page into book references
- Typos/tags

- (Text Converter) Updated to a match more of the sites schema and Improved dealing with edge cases and common typos, such as vestigial (or lack of) spaces
- Fixed BUG-139 "View this feat on the Feats page" from not working
- Typos/tags
- Fixed Eidolons not rendering (BUG-145) - Added Night of the Gray Death - Fix alignment filtering on various pages - Typos/tags

- (Text Converter) Added the ability to convert Hazards, along with improvements when converting spells - Added the following sources: - Dark Archive - Pathfinder: FUMBUS! - Lost Omens: Travel Guide - Revamped Deities statblock rendering (@Spappz) - Reworked Hazards schema - Reworked creatures defensive stats schema to be more in-line with new Hazard schema - Fixed a bug in Variant Items "Main Item" footer not working with non-CRB sources - Improved filters in Organizations page - Started schema-compiler work (languages, traits) - Fixed Certain Creatures being unable to be scaled (BUG-148) - Fixed the Printer view on Bestiary page (BUG-149) - Fixed creatures having wrong stats due to creature scaler (BUG-150 and BUG-153) - Typos/tags

- Added a source compiler and schema
- Changed the spell and ritual duration schema
- Fixed durations in spells and rituals not rendering
- Fixed BotD spells not showing up
- Typos/tags

- Fixed various language-less BotD creatures breaking the renderer - Fixed breaking bug in Creature upscaler - Added all current familiar abilities to quick rules - Added Outlaws of Alkenstar #1–3 - Typos/tags

changelog.title: Spappz the Crit Believer
changelog.txt: - @Spappz pulled through for most of this update! - Added Lost Omens: Gods & Magic book text - Added Lost Omens: Gods & Magic Web Supplement data - Updated deities data, schema, and rendering - Added Critical Hit and Fumble Decks to Tables page - Added optional Quick Rules tab in Tables page - Expand the Traits categories - Fixed Hazards page - Fixed vertical spacing on traits - Moved licenses page to use the sources.json data - Typos/tags

- Rewritten how subclasses in spells are written, so now any subclass can be added and rendered
- Fixed inability to add creatures in GM Screen's Initiative Tracker
- Added Events page
- Typos/tags

- Added Lost Omens: Impossible Lands - Added Hero Points Deck (@Spappz) - Added Gifts and Relics page (@Spappz) - Made indexes a little smaller in size and more consistent - Added "Found In" bestiary filter - Added the original name to search results of aliases, ex. Action: Push -> Action: Push (Shove) - Added 5e aliases to certain actions, ex. Strike = Attack - Recoloured LOTG, LOGM, LOCG, LOWG, LOL, LOPSG, and LOAG sources - Typos/tags (a lot)
- Typos/tags

- Another @Spappz release! - Finished adding The Slithering - Added filter and quick rules for Tempted Curse afflictions - Improved rendering of compact abilities - Fixed rendering bugs for creature spellcasting and known rituals text - Typos/tags

- Added errata changes
- Typos/tags
- Started Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth conversion - Typos/tags

- Fixed <kbd>relicGift</kbd> homebrew
- Fixed "Select by Date" filter option
- Fixed <kbd>otherSources</kbd> in Bestiary page 
- Typos/tags

- Added a bunch of missing creature images (@Spappz)
- Typos/tags

- Fixed hazards not showing Strikes.
- Typos/tags

changelog.title: Quesadilla Day
changelog.txt: - Added Treasure Vault - Removed fluff and books - Added support for direct Item Category parsing in Text Converter - Typos/tags - @Jnosh has been hard at work! - Added the following sources: - Beginner Box - A Fistful of Flowers - Torment and Legacy - Pathfinder One-Shot: Sundered Waves - Threshold of Knowledge - Fixed creature scaler being run when disabled, leading to erroneous stats. - Minor improvements to creature statblock rendering: - show notes on individual skills - fix display of multiple ACs and AC abilities - show ability cost entries - support ability entries on individual saving throws - add skills notes & languages notes to add non-standard entries to the respective lists - Allow activity entries for creature attacks again to enable the rare case of attacks that take multiple actions. - show creature ability prerequisites - improve support for multiple HP entries on creatures (e.g. Hydra) and add support for HP notes - add support for a note property on creature spellcasting entries (e.g. Manticore Paaridar) - add support for a note property on creature abilities (e.g. Mafika Ayuwari) - add support for troop thresholds on creatures - _copy improvements: - Extend property path support to additional _copy modifier modes - add a new _copy mode that sets object properties - add ability to apply Weak/Elite adjustment to creatures during _copy - Add text converter support for: - creature skill notes - language notes - per saving throw abilities - troop thresholds - Typos/tags (and I mean a lot)
- Fixed a rendering bug related to spellcasting notes in creatures
- Fixed a bug regarding being unable to turn on or off heritages on the ancestry page
- Fixed text searching within the Items page - Add Quest for the Frozen Flame hazards (@H2Os) - Typos/tags
- Typos/tags

changelog.title: Stagnation
changelog.txt: This update likely marks the end of Pf2eTools in its current version, as the new remastered rules and development kludge combine to make the book broadly unconvertable in any satisfying way. Minor fixes might still be pushed—especially with community contribution—but no new content or features are planned by 'the team'. The good news, though, is that we're not abandoning the project! In fact, we're already working on a new version of the website, rebuilt from the ground up... although we can't promise when it'll be ready. Please remember that we're all volunteers working for free in our spare time—your appreciation (both material and verbal) goes a long way to keep us motivated! - Added the kineticist Class, class feats, and backgrounds from Rage of Elements - Added Gatewalkers #1 and #3, plus the Player's Guide - Typos/tags

- Fix kineticist feats' footers not displaying properly (@Spappz)
- Fix alignments not capitalising properly in settlement statblocks (@Spappz)
- Add Sky King's Tomb Player's Guide (@Spappz)
- Fix inability to add or remove scaled creatures from the encounter builder (@Sciguymjm)
- Many Typos/tags (@ebullient, @Spappz)
- Typos/tags (@Spappz, @cgahr, @ebullient)

changelog.title: Still Aliiive 🎵
changelog.txt: - Added Player Core spells and rituals (@mortimerhoughton) - Added 'remaster' filter option on spell and ritual pages (@Spappz) - Added a whole lot of missing Rage of Elements content (@cgahr) - Typos/tags (@Spappz, @fredtargaryen, and @VytorCalixto)

- Stylised Player Core content a bit more distinctly (@Spappz, @Vauxs) - Added a tiny bit more Player Core content to ensure we don't need to remember that errata exists (@Spappz) - Typos/tags (@Spappz)

changelog.title: Legacy Support
changelog.txt: - Add Season of Ghosts Player's Guide (@KierannS) - Add Season of Ghosts #1: The Summer That Never Was (@KierannS) - Add Season of Ghosts #2: Let the Leaves Fall (@KierannS) - Add Seven Dooms for Sandpoint Player's Guide (@Spappz) - Add Wardens of Wildwood Player's Guide (@Spappz) - Add minor miscellaneous missing content (@Spappz, @hephaistos-official) - Update (where possible) for the May 2024 errata cycle (@Spappz) - Fix a rare bug when using text: search functionality (@Spappz) - Fix some background filters and table-text displaying incorrectly (@Spappz) - Fix rendering of some creatures' attack traits (@Spappz) - Typos/tags (@Spappz, @fredtargaryen, @ebullient, @VytorCalixto, @miscoined)

changelog.title: The Books Start Coming and They Don't Stop Coming
changelog.txt: - Lots of new content! - @KierannS continues to be busy: - Blood Lords Player's Guide - Lost Omens: Tian Xia World Guide - Season of Ghosts #3: No Breath to Cry - Season of Ghosts #4: To Bloom Below the Web - Stolen Fate Player's Guide (items by @Spappz 😏) - Wake the Dead #1–5 - @Spappz likes kicking easy ones off the list: - A Few Flowers More - Absalom: City of Lost Omens - Dinner at Lionlodge - Gatewalkers #2: They Watched the Stars - Head-Shot the Rot (technically no actual new content in this one lmao) - Malevolence - Mark of the Mantis - Quest for the Frozen Flame Player's Guide - Shadows at Sundown - The Enmity Cycle - A new challenger approaches: @kerbsy! - Rusthenge (backgrounds by @Spappz 😏) - Added minor miscellaneous missing content (@miscoined, @Spappz) - Added divine sanctification filter to deities page (@Spappz) - @Spappz went on a crusade to slightly prettify the changelog - Fix bullet-indentation (does anyone even read this?) - Add a proper stagnation notice (please read this!) - Fix the script that posts changelogs to Discord (reading this instead is acceptable 👍) - Fix minor formatting bugs in the Text Converter for backgrounds (@Spappz) - Fix another rare text: search-functionality bug (@Spappz) - Many typos/tags (@Spappz, @VytorCalixto, @miscoined)

- The data-conversion train just doesn't stop. New sources added: - Curtain Call Player's Guide (@KierannS) - Lost Omens: Highhelm (@KierannS) - Wardens of Wildwood #1: Pactbreaker (@Spappz) - Wardens of Wildwood #2: Severed at the Root (@Spappz) - Some more (but still not all) Player Core content (@Spappz) - Fix the halcyon and elemental spell-list filters being completely incorrect! (@Spappz) - Fixed a number of bugs with the text converter for items, and enable slightly better compatibility with remaster formatting (@Spappz) - Update dependencies (@Spappz) - Tighten linting/code-quality rules (@Spappz) - Typos/tags (@Spappz)
- Fix the feature table on the classes page being broken (@Spappz)
